alert.note: Alert for Campbell (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 7:27PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Campbell County through 845 PM CDT... At 827 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Mound City, or 12 miles northwest of Selby, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Campbell County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
